programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin befriend Clayton, who is a compulsive liar and begins contaminating them with lies.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin receive an heirloom from Richard but lose it.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput takes refuge in a fancy hotel. Specs and Skinny bluff their way past the doorman by acting like they come from the expensive side of the tracks. Spoiler: they dont. The honeymoon suite is like nothing theyve ever seen; the Docs sheen of respectability quickly evaporates when theres robes to wear and beds to jump on. Their taste of the good life doesnt last long, though; another Lamput chase results in a proper trashed hotel room, just like you read about. Then downstairs for some à la carte chaos in the hotel restaurant. Its bad news for the Docs when the tab comes due; a Lab wage wont cover these extras.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: After being framed for feeding coffee to the squirrels in the park, Gumball proclaims that Mrs Robinson is pure evil. Darwin tells him that theres no such thing as pure evil, and sets out to prove that Mrs Robinson wasnt born evil, she just became that way because of a trauma in her past. But when he learns the true darkness of her nature, he decides she deserves her grand comeuppance.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom and Dad struggle to keep hyperactive toddler-aged Gumball from trashing the house and exhausting them they decide to buy him a pet. It works but theres a problem: every goldfish they get him is short-lived and inevitably ends up being flushed down the toilet.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom and Dad struggle to keep hyperactive toddler-aged Gumball from trashing the house and exhausting them they decide to buy him a pet. It works but theres a problem: every goldfish they get him is short-lived and inevitably ends up being flushed down the toilet.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: "When Alan ditches Gumball to do something more fun Gumball is desperate to track him down and make him pay for his betrayal. Gumball has through gritted teeth prepared a special dinner for Alan to apologise for the way he has treated him in the past. When Alan cancels he is overjoyed until a post on Elmore Plus reveals Alan lied about his Mom being sick and is having a day of fun with his family instead. Gumball tracks down the traitor to give him a piece of his mind but when he finds out his Mom really is sick he has to find a way to make it up to him.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Theres never a dull moment in Elmore Junior High! Come and watch the best Gumball school episodes!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Darwin asks for his advice on hats, Gumball suddenly cant speak and offends Darwin. Darwin is convinced Gumball said he had a fat head. But when Gumball tries to correct him, his speech and movement all start going wrong at the same time. He soon realises that he may not be the only one in Elmore having communication problems.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When she has no one to share her lunch with, Jamie realises she needs a sweetheart. Darwin is the only one who doesnt flee immediately, so he and Jamie are soon an item by default. He decides the best way to ride it out is to just say nothing until his new girlfriend gets it our of her system. But sometimes not making a sound is harder than it sounds.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Jamie has decided she needs a sweetheart and Darwin is the best candidate, unluckily for him. / Anais has made a new friend, but Gumball and Darwin arent sure their relationship is equal. / Bobert finds he is infected with a virus called love.exe. He asks Gumball and Darwin to give him a definition for the word. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin seek healthy food for their family, but an evil food consortium controls the industry.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Penny must stay together all day to prove their bond, defying Mr. Smalls astrological prediction.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When their parents all go to a charity gala at the school, the kids are locked in a classroom with a VHS tape. However, when the room starts to heat up, they need a leader to get them out of the situation and have to choose between Anais, a qualified but unpopular candidate or Gumball, a charismatic candidate with absolutely no plans.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Clayton realises he can imitate his classmates, and begins stealing the lives of the people of Elmore.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When people that barely know each other start falling in love, Gumball thinks he knows whos behind it. He rushes to Sarahs house and finds her writing in a magic notebook that turns everything in it into reality. When everything in Elmore gets crazier and crazier theres only one thing for it: they have to write their way out.

programme.desc: Gumball Darwin and Carrie team up to convince their fellow students that the school is haunted. The kids convince the school to hire them as ghost exterminators and take their payment in Halloween candy. But when it turns out Gargaroth is real suddenly Gumball is expected to be the towns saviour.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is walking in the same direction as Hot Dog Guy and with each step it becomes increasingly awkward. Gumball is too busy singing about ketchup to notice hes about to bump into Hot Dog Guy. They manage to get through an awkward moment only to discover theyre travelling in the same direction. Their journey becomes increasingly awkward until a delusional mall cop tries to arrest them and in the process allows them to finally go their separate ways…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. A breaking news report tells the Wattersons that their neighbour is among the several mysterious disappearances happening across Elmore. Their search for clues leads them to find a strange egg which they soon discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realise that its their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin agree to do all of Tobiass chores in exchange for good points! Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias is doing way better than them in an online game called Galatrek. Tobias admits he earns "good points" doing chores for his parents which he then exchanges for dollars to buy cool stuff for Galatrek. If Gumball and Darwin do Tobias chores they can earn his "good points" and use them for Galatrek. Gumball and Darwin think theyve hit the jackpot. But these "good points" may not be quite as good as Tobias claims...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Rocky suggests that the Elmore Junior High kids skip school, the bus is boarded by criminals who seem to want to teach them the importance of school attendance. The masked culprits are clearly the childrens parents, faking a heist to teach them a lesson. But when the police get involved for real, it becomes clear the parents arent the ones pulling the strings.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: As night falls in Elmore the Moon takes us on a tour through the various dreams - and nightmares - of the towns slumbering inhabitants. Each characters dream shows us their innermost desires their greatest fears or just how plain weird they are.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs go out en masse to catch Lamput, there is a mishap with a bucket of grey paint, and no-one notices the extra Doc on the van-ride back to the Lab. Lamput-in-disguise is overwhelmed by the scale of the Labs operations - but soon enough proves to be pretty sharp at this Doc business. To catch a Lamput, youve gotta think like a Lamput, see. Lamputs so good at science-ing that soon enough poor old Specs and Skinny are sacked with extreme prejudice. Lamput cant stand watching his old buddies kicked out on the street. If only folks would believe the newest Doc: under this grey exterior, there beats a heart as orange as orange can be.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny amazing sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny brings home the wrong laundry bag. Not a disaster, as it happens, since this particular laundry bag contains uncanny super-suits that grant mighty powers. The Docs get heat vision, amazing telekinesis rays, magnetic boots, you name it. All perfect for the person who dreams of… doing the household chores. With great power comes great boringness, apparently. After a satisfying day of getting the house spick n span, the penny finally drops for the Super-docs: they realise they have a far higher calling. Is it fighting evil and helping the underdog? Nope, its chasing Lamput, same as usual. Meanwhile, however, two actual superheroes really want their suits back. Turns out these heroes are quite into helping the underdog. Which is good news for Lamput, and very, very bad news for the Docs.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons try and reconnect Darwin to his fish roots. When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isnt fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. So the family try to re-connect him with his aquatic culture; they try fish-food fish-language even fish clothes. But when none of it works they realize they may have to let him go.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball gives Billy his first taste of video-games but the sheer excitement causes him to pass out. His mother Felicity summons the Parent Teacher Association and threatens to ban video games all across Elmore. Gumball and Darwin are given three chances to prove that video games can be a force for good, but when they fail they decide to prove that books can be just as dangerous.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

Unless you count "literally turning into a monster every time you hiccup" as "better". programme.desc: Ella is enlisted to pet sit Buttons, a friends dog, on the very day she has to finish a school project about Venus. When the thunder from the storms around Venus scare Buttons into accidentally detaching himself from his pod, he lands on the pla net and disappears. Ella and her friends search frantically on the hot planet but cannot find him. Its Buttons who finds Ella! Ella admits she shouldnt have taken her furry friend with her, but at least she learned new facts for her project!

programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. The bell doesnt stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.desc: When Glitchs arm shorts out, Ellas dad has the right tools to fix him. While hes at it, Dad shows off his latest creation, a Super Towing Arm. Slippy is impressed and Glitch is more than happy to try it on for size

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella is enlisted to pet sit Buttons, a friends dog, on the very day she has to finish a school project about Venus. She decides to take on both responsibilities at once by taking Buttons with her to the planet to capture the final piece of video footage she needs. When the thunder from the storms around Venus scare Buttons into accidentally detaching himself from his pod, he lands on the pla net and disappears. Ella and her friends search frantically on the hot planet but cannot find him. Its Buttons who finds Ella! Ella admits she shouldnt have taken her furry friend with her, but at least she learned new facts for her project!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippys Dad insists he get rid of all his inventions to free up some space. Slippy cant bear to, so decides to store them on the dark side of Mercury.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: On Sedna, Ella and her friends discover the space probe Voyager 1. Ella takes the Golden Record from the probe and takes it to Mom who reveals that Ellas greatest grandfather recorded a greeting on it!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Human Day is Ellas favourite day of the year and she invites Madhu to join her family for dinner. Madhu wants to make a good impression and wonders how to prepare.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry take their chase to the skies. Kite-flying has never been this intense. Who will emerge as the ultimate master of strings?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad volunteers to babysit Portly for the Otters only to find babysitting isnt as easy as it looks.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Hedge normally hibernates but this year she is determined to see Christmas. Although shes not much use in decoration preparation, she is able to bring peace and understanding to all when there is a dispute over the Christmas Tree.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Tinker comes up with a cunning plan for herself and Chief to be delivered as a parcel into Toad Hall. But the journey there proves to be more much more arduous than she could possibly imagine.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Chief agrees to accompany Toad on a day trip out in the car but only if he can drive. Chiefs plan is to steal the car by throwing Toad out but his erratic driving sees them perched precariously over the river bank. Can they ever be friends now?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: When Hedge learns to play chess, she fails to win gracefully. Soon no-one will play with her!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After a spat over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings find gold leaf-wrapped chocolate bits scattered in the jungle. Delicious! On the backs of a bat and a tapir, the rodents and the bear fight over the harvest of candy. They then realize that the chocolate came from the back of a truck which is losing its cargo. Grizzy and the Lemmings join forces to recover the entire load.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the last spoonful of Yummy. Their brawl is interrupted when they happen upon a full crate of chocolate spread in the garage. The rodents snatch the crate and take off on a drone. The bear catches up with them, mounted on the back of a giant bat, but the cargo falls onto the roof of a sacred Mayan temple thats boobytrapped! When they recover the Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings are pursued by a stone giant!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Night has fallen over the jungle and the solar panels do not generate enough electricity to charge Grizzys TV. When he surprises the Lemmings playing with fireflies that could make his panels work, he catapults the rodents into the distance. The rodents land on a Mayan temple where they discover a magic tiara that can control fireflies. Grizzy, lacking electricity, wants to get the tiara for himself.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After stealing Grizzys jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the Lemmings propel the bear far from the log cabin. Grizzy lands in a temple where he finds a crystal skull which gives you the power to sow discord within a group. Grizzy uses it to set the rodents at odds amongst themselves and takes advantage of the general fight to recover the chocolate spread. But the effects of the magic skull only last a certain time and the ill-feelings cease. The Lemmings unite to give Grizzy a taste of his own medicine!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While climbing back to the cabin carrying a load of delicious berries, Grizzy trips and falls over backwards. He performs a series of acrobatics worthy of a diving champ and resurfaces safe and sound despite himself. The Lemmings, who saw everything, are in awe and treat Grizzy like an idol. Grizzy starts to enjoy this VIP treatment until the Lemmings ask him to repeat his exploit. Grizzy agrees but discovers that the Lemmings have built a giant diving board for the occasion.

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Mia and Kai have to infiltrate Enigmas base, taken over by the villains, to get it back and access the super computer.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders race against the clock to build Cecil Turtle a new racetrack. Daffy gets caught up in his own desire to race and changes part of the build.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: George P. Mandrake hires The Looney Builders to build a T. Rex fossil. Its Tweetys job to place the bones with his crane, but his fear of the big dino affects his ability to get the job done.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because The Jokers van is too dangerous! When Bam discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset… until Redbird bails him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Jestahs insults get the best of her, a short-tempered Bibi tries to not let the big-wheeled bullys words get to her so she can help Batgirl catch Harley.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang heads to the Velmas beloved authentic Renaissance Fair, where they must find a way to infiltrate the royal feast in order to stop an evil court jester from ending the kings reign, permanently, and closing the fair.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Finally fed up with monsters and mayhem, Shaggy and Scooby decide to quit the gang and train their replacements in one on-the-job training session, unraveling the mystery of a vampire thats terrorizing a small town.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket has just inherited an antique grandfather clock - Mr Bean is impressed! But he soon starts to resent it when it bongs loudly on the hour all through the night. Desperate for sleep as dawn is breaking, he fiddles inside the clock, only for it to fall apart and onto the floor! Can he get the bulky heirloom to a repair shop and back before Mrs Wicket wakes up?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans tranquillity is shattered by deafening roadworks outside his bedroom window. Threats, sabotage and subterfuge all fail to quell the cacophony until Bean has the ingenious idea of feeding the workmen into peaceful submission. But the silence ends with a bang!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctors outfit with stethoscope - great Teddy - Ill give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking hes a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before hes found out?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they wont forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs cant keep up with Lamput and he manages to escape them at every move. Inspired by the animals at a local zoo, the Docs build a machine to harness the animal prowess. Maybe now they can be as fast as a cheetah and outrun Lamput!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Doc Specs and Lamput finds themselves stranded on an island. Will they be able to get home? Or maybe they will make a new home on the island. Has Doc Specs traded Doc Skinny for Lamput as his best friend? Crazier things have happened!

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: When a black cat crosses Kryptos path, hes determined to catch it before Halloween night is through.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. It soars off, leaving a rainbow-colored streak in its wake. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for his beloved she-bear, while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo on a bucking unicorn.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While looking for the TV remote-control device, Grizzy happens onto a box that can localize a bunch of keys thanks to its key ring, which is equipped with a tracker. Grizzy decides to stick the spy device under a jar of chocolate spread, just in case the Lemmings should decide to carry it off.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the cabin topsy-turvy and created an obstacle course to race through in a hamster ball. Grizzy intervenes and ousts both the Lemmings and their ball so that he can relax in peace. Unfortunately for him, he has tossed the Lemmings into a reserve of Zorb Balls, those giant inflatable spheres used to hurtle down slopes.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a customized hang-glider using a supermarket shopping cart for the nacelle and a ventilator as an engine. Their aerobatics fascinate the she-bear that Grizzy is in love with, which gives him the idea of replacing the shopping cart with a double-seat and inviting his beloved for a sky promenade. But confiscating a wing in mid-flight is not within the reach of just any old bear.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings scribble all over the book "Snow White" on the living room sofa. Grizzy throws them off with scant ceremony and they crash to the floor with their book, which is open to the page where the dwarves are working in a mine with pickaxes. The shock landing sets off a personality disorder. The Lemmings believe they are the dwarves in the tale and start attacking the cabin with pickaxes.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings favorite chocolate spread brand is organizing a big competition where the prize is a giant jar of spread. To win, one must make ten baskets in a row in a hoop set up on a supermarket parking lot for the occasion. Ready to play?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Skullie warns Tom that its almost midnight, so hed best be on alert for one of the Catsylvania ghouls to show up. programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Hoping to woo Toodles, Tom decides to make some homemade perfume for her. He throws in many unusual ingredients and gets a surprisingly pleasant outcome, getting the attention he craved. However, soon Tom and Jerry must come up with a plan when the heavenly scent turns bad.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Butch gets muscled out of his alley by a bullying runt of an alley cat and Tom, Jerry and Spike team up to help Butch win back his territory (and keep him out of theirs).

programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean likes nothing more than to relax on his sofa with a good meal and his favourite telly programme. TV dinners may well be a thing of the past for Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A puzzling puzzle has Mr Bean truly puzzled.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean attempts to build a shady gazebo in the back garden on a scorching hot day. But as he digs into the ground he unearths a huge unexploded bomb. programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans car is filthy so he gives it a good wash. His sparklingly clean car attracts the attention of other drivers who offer to pay Mr Bean to wash their cars too. programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.desc: Lamput likes nothing more than a pleasant evening watching the night sky for UFOs. The peaceful night is ruined, of course, by those pesky Docs. programme.title: Lamput

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs at a small sea side town, Lamput meets a lonely sea monster. Lamput attempts to help the sea monster makes friends but all his plans backfires. programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Petunias Grandpa Oink to upgrade his farm. They take things too far and Grandpa Oink misses some of the things he loves most about farming.

programme.desc: Marvin the Martian hires The Looney Builders to build an outer space ball court on Mars. Bugs is a big fan of the sport, and soon becomes a ball and build "hog."

programme.desc: Fred switches places with Jeff, the tour guide at a history museum, to give him a chance to lead the Gang in solving a mystery. programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: In the run-up to a fundraising event for the Donkey Sanctuary, Irma realises she doesnt have a posh dress, so Mr Bean goes to buy one for her. However, all the dresses are very expensive - but he comes up with a plan. He can buy a dress, then return it after the event provided it still has the label attached. Can Mr Bean protect the dress without Irma realising what hes doing?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate. Bean begs Mrs. Wicket to let him stay with her. programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: You never can tell when inspirations gonna strike. Specs and Skinny waste no time tracking Lamput down and ruining a perfectly good picnic. As usual the Docs snatch defeat from the jaws of victory when Lamput gets a hold of the necklace. Now the orange blob can morph AND go invisible. No fair!

programme.desc: In the run-up to a fundraising event for the Donkey Sanctuary, Irma realises she doesnt have a posh dress, so Mr Bean goes to buy one for her. Can Mr Bean protect the dress without Irma realising what hes doing?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. Its a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irmas birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. Theres no time to lose as Mr Bean promises hell get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans landlady is hopping mad on finding molehills on her lovely croquet lawn. Bean looks to get hammered if he does not rid the old lady of the cuddly little half-blind culprit. He fails dismally with his eccentric mole extermination methods and ends up simply taking the pesky rodent for a ride.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The cupboards of the log cabin are hopelessly empty and Grizzys belly is rumbling. Through his binoculars, he observes the overexcited Lemmings slipping all sorts of small metal objects into the slot of… a Yummy vending machine!?! The bear joins them on the pontoon. If only they could find some coins to make the machine work. Maybe the solution is to find the booty indicated on the treasure map they unearthed on the beach?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After accidentally breaking his favorite sofa, Grizzy spots a cozy fishing cabin on a neighboring island. He requisitions the Lemmings canoe to get there but discovers that the new cabin is dilapidated and lacking all comfort. The poor bear had been deluded by a poster. However, a fabulous yacht is moored nearby. It catches both his attention and that of the Lemmings, who have just disembarked on the island!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun taking potshots at sand statues depicting Grizzy. Outraged, he catapults them far into the distance. Grizzy takes advantage of their absence to erect a monumental sculpture of himself. But just as he takes a selfie in front of the sculpture, Grizzy realizes that the Lemmings have laid hands on… a pirate cannon!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After being hit over the head, the Lemmings become hypnotized by a fitness poster and take themselves for sports coaches. They are determined to forcefully train Grizzy, who would much rather lounge around than do push-ups and squats. But the Lemmings new personality makes them particularly overbearing.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Nothing seems to be biting Grizzys fishing rod and the bear is in despair. Suddenly he spots a fabulous swordfish swimming in the lagoon. The bear is already licking his chops, when he sees the Lemmings straddling the fish in a rodeo game. From inside the cabin he uses as a mooring post, Grizzy manages to snare the swordfish and is about to pull it in, but the Lemmings are riding it toward the high seas. Each party tugs hard. And the cabin starts to slide…

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that several drops of Tabasco sauce poured into a rock fault releases powerful sprays of steam that propel them high into the sky on a pot lid. Except that the entire volcanic island shudders each time the drops are poured. Grizzy, who has decided to take a nap in his hammock, confiscates the bottle before realizing that the Lemmings have an entire stock !

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have decided to organize a race with two sand yachts they found on the beach. The only thing missing, is a worthy adversary. They put Grizzy, who was taking a nap, on one of the yachts without waking him up. And the race is off. Grizzy wakes up in shock onboard his sand yacht.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird struggles to stop Poison Ivys diabolical schemes because he wants to be in the spotlight. But when he needs to use the bat-o-flage and become invisible, hell have to learn that doing good is its own reward.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are hired by Dutch to find his missing cursed ruby that causes him to have bad luck when its missing. They help him find Roxie the burglar but find out that shes also being cursed by the ruby.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom eats some canned cheese that has gone bad and hallucinates.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Fed up with Toms cat hair, Rick buys the Suck-Up, a robot vacuum cleaner. The Suck-Up patrols the house and cleans 24/7. At first, Tom enjoys the little modern mechanical marvel using it to clean Jerry out of house and home! But when the self-programming Suck-Up turns on them both and takes over the house, Tom and Jerry team up to defeat it.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The storm of the century is brewing, at least according to Tuffy and Jerry who are giving a little pay-back to Tom for tormenting them earlier. Spike gets caught up in the hysteria over the impending storm, too. When Spike uncovers the ruse, the mice must brace for their own storm.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its picture day for Spike and Tom! Spike and Tom both end up covered in mud and in the Laundro-mutt grooming van. A fight leads to a runaway van and a bath they both wanted to avoid. Tuffy and Jerry are determined to be included in this years picture.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: While checking out a rogue planet, Ella, Slippy and Madhu crash onto its surface. When the heat from underground causes the planets icy crust to burst open, they all tumble down into the darkness and become separated.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella feels terrible when she accidentally ruins some of her mothers old photographs. She convinces her family to recreate the scenes in the old pictures into new ones!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella and the gang are going camping! But as they approach their camp site, Maggie alerts them that a giant solar flare is heading their way. They must turn off all their electronics until the storm subsides.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella is very impressed by Angelie, her moms new field assistant. She especially likes the incredible tricks she does on her surfboard!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella and her friends play a star-riddle game that is a tradition in Slippys family. In order to beat Slippys cousins, they need to find some super-giant stars!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Ratty is trying out his new snorkelling equipment but Portly mistakes Ratty underwater as a River Monster. An alarmed Hedge exaggerates the story and Toad tries to catch the River Monster on camera as all the riverbankers rush to witness this fabled creature.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: The weasels steal Rattys rowing boat but soon find themselves in trouble on a fast flowing river.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: When Mole struggles to get everyone to embrace his new-found enthusiasm for forest bathing, he tries to be more assertive like Toad. But the newly confident Mole soon clashes with Toads forceful personality. Can either learn something from the other?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Mole is having a clear out and gives Toad Mr Tiddles, Moles old teddy bear. Once its gone, Mole has second thoughts and wants him back. But the weasels kidnap Mr Tiddles and Mole and Toad have to mount a daring rescue mission to get dear Mr Tiddles back.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Adder sets one riverbanker against the other in order to seize all of Moles toffee apple pie but they soon realise she is up to one of her tricks again.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes a taxi to his local toyshop but a dodgy cabbie thinks he can take Mr Bean for a ride. After a mix up Mr Bean finds himself driving the taxi and starts to have fun couriering people to their destinations even giving an American tourist an extensive tour of London. But will the taxi driver find out whats been going on and how much will Beans final fare be?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Beans plan seems to be working - until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irmas admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But its not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Beans home - eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.desc: While checking out a rogue planet, Ella, Slippy and Madhu crash onto its surface. When the heat from underground causes the planets icy crust to burst open, they all tumble down into the darkness and become separated.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: A series of spooky sounds and sights leads the Batwheels to believe that the Batcave is haunted by a B-B-Bat-Ghost!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Ratty is trying out his new snorkelling equipment but Portly mistakes Ratty underwater as a River Monster. An alarmed Hedge exaggerates the story and Toad tries to catch the River Monster on camera as all the riverbankers rush to witness this fabled creature.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: The weasels steal Rattys rowing boat but soon find themselves in trouble on a fast flowing river.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Mole is having a clear out and gives Toad Mr Tiddles, Moles old teddy bear. Once its gone, Mole has second thoughts and wants him back. But the weasels kidnap Mr Tiddles and Mole and Toad have to mount a daring rescue mission to get dear Mr Tiddles back.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Adder sets one riverbanker against the other in order to seize all of Moles toffee apple pie but they soon realise she is up to one of her tricks again.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple. Determined to recover their favorite afternoon snack, they confront one another in the maze, but end up getting totally lost. Grizzy finds himself back at square one and decides to find something to make holes in the walls and cheat. As for the Lemmings, they discover a magic map of the place that enables you to orient yourself and modify the corridors in real time. Which cheater will win?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Things start to disappear from the log cabin as if by magic. Grizzy is persuaded that the Lemmings are the culprits, but the Lemmings are also victims of inexplicable thefts. As they argue, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the true authors of the repeated thefts: a gang of fanatic partridges who bring stolen objects as offerings to their goddess, a giant partridge. Grizzy and Lemmings join forces to infiltrate the nest and recover their belongings.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A frog swallows an ancestral jewel that bestows it with the power of mind control. Grizzy uses the frog to swallow the flies that have proliferated in the cabin, and which now let themselves be docilely caught. The Lemmings dont miss a thing. They decide to get hold of the frog to hypnotize an uncooperative tapir who refuses to play rodeo. Grizzy hypnotizes the Lemmings, who become his servants. But several Lemmings escaped and are preparing a rescue mission.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A military convoy has an accident while transporting top-secret material. In the impact, a technological sphere flies out and rolls over to Grizzy, who was gathering berries in the forest. Grizzy realizes that the sphere is a sort of compass that indicates the direction of his desires. He follows it and finds a bush overflowing with his favorite berries. The Lemmings recover the compass to find super game sites in the forest.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a hand-shaped scepter ornated with a gold nugget that covers anything it touches with gold. Grizzy uses the object to "gold leaf" the Lemmings and swipe their chocolate bar. The Lemmings use their golden casts as armors to recover their chocolate. During the combat, the gold nugget is replaced by a chocolate one: the scepter now coats everything with chocolate. The Lemmings snatch it and flee.

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Kai and Mia must find a Legendary SuperThing to help them build a Kazoom fragment locator.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pauleen Penguin hires The Looney Builders to build her a home in Looneyburg. Lola soon discovers they got the design wrong and the crew has to make adjustments.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Tweety leads The Looney Builders in building a new merry-go-round at the park for the kids. His crane breaks down and his small size affects his ability to contribute to the build.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling neglected after being passed over on missions, Bam asks MOE to install experimental upgrades to curry Batmans favor. But, when Bams new powers are stronger than he can control, Batman - and the mission - are suddenly in danger!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird gets excited when he learns that Batman and Robin are taking him and Bam for a drive up the coast! But when the Joker and his van Prank show up unexpectedly and ruin Redbirds beach day plans, Bam helps him realize that even though things didnt go exactly as planned, they still had a great day!

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: While on a trip to New York, Scooby and the gang find themselves taking part in a dog show competition.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Unhappy about a mystery-free, three-day, cross-country train trip with the gang, Fred is pleasantly surprised to discover a monster mystery on board. Hes less pleasantly surprised however, when that mystery is interrupted by a second mystery, then a third, then a fourth…

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: In the run-up to a fundraising event for the Donkey Sanctuary, Irma realises she doesnt have a posh dress, so Mr Bean goes to buy one for her. However, all the dresses are very expensive - but he comes up with a plan. He can buy a dress, then return it after the event provided it still has the label attached. Can Mr Bean protect the dress without Irma realising what hes doing?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean likes nothing more than to relax on his sofa with a good meal and his favourite telly programme. Unfortunately, a painful explosion of springs under his bottom puts an end to that. He sets about buying another one… but, alas, sofas are expensive items. TV dinners may well be a thing of the past for Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wickets pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbours house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput is caught but makes a new friend, Tuzki who comes to his rescue!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs at a small sea side town, Lamput meets a lonely sea monster. Lamput attempts to help the sea monster makes friends but all his plans backfires. Now the locals are enraged, and the docs take the opportunity to stir up an angry mob to take down the creature and catch Lamput in the process! Not unless Lamputs new friend has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs go out en masse to catch Lamput, there is a mishap with a bucket of grey paint, and no-one notices the extra Doc on the van-ride back to the Lab. Lamput-in-disguise is overwhelmed by the scale of the Labs operations - but soon enough proves to be pretty sharp at this Doc business. To catch a Lamput, youve gotta think like a Lamput, see. Lamputs so good at science-ing that soon enough poor old Specs and Skinny are sacked with extreme prejudice. Lamput cant stand watching his old buddies kicked out on the street. If only folks would believe the newest Doc: under this grey exterior, there beats a heart as orange as orange can be.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Freed from the ice which had preserved him for millions of years, a saber-toothed bear bursts into the cabin, starving to death. Grizzy fails to protect his reserves while the Lemmings fail at taming him for the rodeo - even though they all team up. But when they realize that a prehistoric necklace will enable them to control the creature, its each man for himself again!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a top-secret Canadian Army prototype that allows you to pass through solid surfaces. How can Grizzy prevent the "infiltrating" Lemmings from stealing his jar of chocolate spread?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have found an Amerindian eagle amulet that endows he who wears it with the powers of a bird of prey. Grizzy would like to impress his beloved she-bear by soaring majestically through the sky. But to confiscate the magic totem from the Lemmings, who are now as sharp as eagles, Grizzy will have to use the cunning... of a puma.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with the rangers electric guitar and the cabin walls tremble with their experimental rock. Just as Grizzy is about to destroy the instrument, he realizes it can make harmonious sounds too. Will this be enough to seduce the she-bear hes in love with?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: To finally be on an equal footing with Grizzys imposing build and throw their own weight around in the cabin, the Lemmings decide to wear a blowup sumotori costume. Grizzy is roughly chucked out of the living room area. He decides to follow a special sumo diet to become the strongest guy around.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover an ancient Amerindian table with the power to show you past events. They relive their prehistoric ancestors first confrontations and learn that chocolate spread was invented long long ago.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A magicians hat is left behind at Ginger and Ricks house. Jerry runs into it, but when Tom reaches in after him, all he gets are multiple magician props. Tyke and Spike soon join in, and the top hat continues to wreak havoc.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: In Catsylvania, a strange flying bug bites Tom, transforming him into a Tom-sized bug monster. Van Mouseling saves the village with an old-fashioned canister of bug poison, and Tom flies off to the abandoned castle on the hill. But Toms troubles arent over yet! Inside, he must deal with huge spider webs and a spider the size of a truck.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: While mopping the kitchen floor, Tom uses an odd-looking sponge on a plate to clean up the mess. But the "sponge" turns out to be a rare truffle, which the estates new pig ate. To pacify Cates, Tom and Jerry must find out whether the animal is also good at hunting truffles.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger places her grannys old cuckoo clock in the hall, and it still works! However, the newly arrived clock causes issues when Tom wants to catch the tiny wooden bird inside and Tuffy wants to befriend it.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: At midnight, a gothic lady cat appears with her favorite sinister plant creatures including her personal favorite: Fang, a big man-eating plant. As long as its sealed in the hothouse, nothing can go wrong. But Tom, Jerry and Tuffy soon have their hands full with the escaped plant.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Cates appears and assigns Tom the job of sweeping the estates chimneys, warning him not to upset the Duchesss new exotic pet bird. Unfortunately, both the pet bird and a stork at the top of the chimney think Jerry is a worm. Soon chaos breaks out, hurting Toms cleaning efforts.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: In the run-up to a fundraising event for the Donkey Sanctuary, Irma realises she doesnt have a posh dress, so Mr Bean goes to buy one for her. However, all the dresses are very expensive - but he comes up with a plan. He can buy a dress, then return it after the event provided it still has the label attached. Can Mr Bean protect the dress without Irma realising what hes doing?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.sub-title: Where Did You Get That Cat?
programme.desc: Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realizing that its only his landladys furry hat Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vets in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean helps Mrs Wicket collect up all her money together after she witnesses a robbery. With all her cash safely locked in a bank vault Mrs Wicket suddenly finds she has a new admirer but Mr Bean doesnt trust this smooth operator one bit. With wedding bells ringing Mr Bean races against time to solve the mystery and save Mrs Wicket…and her money.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they wont forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem - but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. Hes so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares - with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But hes promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match - only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket has just inherited an antique grandfather clock - Mr Bean is impressed! But he soon starts to resent it when it bongs loudly on the hour all through the night. Desperate for sleep as dawn is breaking, he fiddles inside the clock, only for it to fall apart and onto the floor! Can he get the bulky heirloom to a repair shop and back before Mrs Wicket wakes up?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its a trip down memory lane when the Docs find an old childhood photo and reminisce about their first meeting so many years ago. It all started at Lab School, when Specs was a naive dork and Skinny was the school ruffian. A lot has changed since then, of course. Specs is now the tough guy, and Skinny is now the dork, and their early adventures set in motion a bunch of other consequences, too. Embittered, angry boss? Check. Moustachioed Chief of Police with an age-old grudge? Check. Also dont forget the lab experiment that went spectacularly wrong. That orange blob in the test tube: did that just move?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs latest invention generates identical versions of themselves and create a whole mob of "Duplicate" Specs and Skinnies to catch Lamput! However, the device becomes faulty, and the Duplicates cant be turned off. Now the Docs are stuck with annoying copies of themselves who are turning their lives upside down!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: When Lamput disguises himself as a book and gets returned to the Library, the Docs have to be super quiet in their attempts to get him back. They finally manage to sneak past the Librarian, but all chaos erupts when they open a mysterious book in the restricted area. Lamput and the Docs have to team up to get the new ghostly resident back to where he belongs!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build their headquarters a car wash. Daffy doesnt want to wash Dumpy and goes to extreme lengths to keep him dirty and preserve their memories.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, theyll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Its Halloween, so the crew decorates their garage for the Looneyburg Trick-Or-Treaters.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When King Tut steals an ancient artifact that makes his Carcophagus magically fast, MOE equips Bam with rocket boosters to catch the villain and Bam must learn how to control all that speed.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Now that Catwoman has equipped Kitty with wings, Batwing tries to teach the easily-distracted Kitty how to fly.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy and Scoobys favourite chef is finally opening his own restaurant but a monstrous Yeti threatens the opening night. The gang has to solve the mystery before desert is served and Shaggy and Scooby have to resist eating all the food thats meant for the customers!

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne always dreamed of meeting extra-terrestrial life but that dream becomes a nightmare when the gang gets caught up in the mystery of a scary Alien Monster and brought to Area 53 - a government facility so secret, its two numbers greater than Area 51!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride - but the security guard makes it clear its for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, its not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman. He tries increasingly ridiculous ways to warm up his tea his toothpaste and himself before venturing out to discover somewhere to hunker down and get warm.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert - but he has to disguise himself as an old-aged pensioner or he wont be allowed on the coach. Once on the coach Bean drives everyone mad with his anti-boredom antics.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught - where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers - even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked "ollies" with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket has just inherited an antique grandfather clock - Mr Bean is impressed! But he soon starts to resent it when it bongs loudly on the hour all through the night. Desperate for sleep as dawn is breaking, he fiddles inside the clock, only for it to fall apart and onto the floor! Can he get the bulky heirloom to a repair shop and back before Mrs Wicket wakes up?

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: The Kazoom Kids infiltrate Mr. Kings base to take back the Kazoom and save Kaboom City, but Kid Fury gets trapped inside.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang gets caught up in international espionage and intrigue when they cross paths with British secret agent Jenny Vex and must help her complete her dangerous mission of stopping a monstrous evil mercenary called Minus from killing the meal of breakfast - forever.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Freds worst nightmare comes true when an evil spirit possesses the Mystery Machine and turns his beloved van into an unrelenting monster out to destroy him and the gang before they can solve the mystery.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput takes refuge in a spooky castle on the hill. The Docs, hot on Lamputs heels, find an unattended broomstick, and, typically, their first instinct is to use it to try to squish their orange quarry. But they quickly discover the broomstick has other, way cooler, uses. Before long the Docs are engaged in some high-speed, unlicenced magical broomstick-riding. Luckily for Lamput, the castles owner steps in. Shes green and witchy, and pretty annoyed about being disturbed from her moonbaking. When the docs break her magical broom, she flies into full witch-mode. Everyone gets transformed into frogs. Which, for Lamput, is a normal day at the office.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride - but the security guard makes it clear its for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, its not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans tranquillity is shattered by deafening roadworks outside his bedroom window. Threats, sabotage and subterfuge all fail to quell the cacophony until Bean has the ingenious idea of feeding the workmen into peaceful submission. But the silence ends with a bang!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. He confiscates the crustacean and uses it to take the tops off his coconuts. As they fight over the crab, the characters discover a remote-control device in a secret grotto that operates a giant crab. Grizzy takes over the controls, but the Lemmings want to play with the joystick too!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A helicopter takes off from the beach, leaving behind installations for a TV game, namely lots of food supplies - which are locked up. To access the keys and the food, participants must win team tests under the surveillance of a drone. The Lemmings are the yellow team. The red team is comprised of Grizzy, an oar, and a flabbergasted crab!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While trying to avoid the Lemmings outboard speedboat, Grizzy punctures his air mattress and is propelled into a hidden grotto where he finds a conch decorated with Maori symbols that can control whales. Grizzy returns, proudly straddling his cetacean and chases the Lemmings from his peaceful spot. But the Lemmings imagination is equal to the size of this potential new playmate!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While arguing over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings happen upon a polar bear cub who is crying. When the little bear sees them, he wails even louder. Annoyed by his sobs, Grizzy and the rodents try to pacify him, but nothing works. After feeding and changing him, the baby finally falls asleep. How can they pick up their Yummy battle without waking the cub?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A meteorite falls not far from the cabin. While the Lemmings are sledding outside on a metal pot lid, their sled is abruptly drawn to the extraterrestrial boulder. In seventh heaven, the rodents start over again, this time using the TV satellite dish. But Grizzy, determined to get the dish back at any cost, must confront the magnetism of the meteorite and the fury of the Lemmings, for the rodents are set on playing.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have set up a long line of dominos in the cabin that ends with several giant ice blocks and a rocket outside. Weary of not finding the peace and calm he loves so dearly, Grizzy sabotages the game. The rocket hits an ice block and blows up the cabin. Grizzy gets his hands on a machine that can sculpt ice. The bear dreams of an igloo, but the Lemmings have other projects.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings find an ice block outside the log cabin that holds a frozen prehistoric animal: a saber-toothed racoon. Softened, the Lemmings free the creature and try to tame it like a kitten. But the raccoon is like a whirlwind. Grizzy wakes up and discovers the cabin topsy-turvy and flies into a rage. But when the bear tries to kick the rodents out, the wild raccoon challenges him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Santas sleigh is damaged, the Batwheels must help Santa deliver presents to the children of Gotham, and stop the Legion of Zoom from trying to steal them!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Music Meister is stealing the singing voices of all the people in Gotham. Now its up to bashful Buff to gain confidence in his voice and use it to take down Music Meister.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batwings favorite Bat-Net gets ripped during a chase with Riddler, she must learn to let go of her old net (despite it being her favorite) if shes going to help Batman stop the Riddler in his tracks.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Hector hires The Looney Builders to build him a burger restaurant, but Daffy is so focused on beating his handheld game that he causes major setbacks.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

Jerry goes to great lengths to tempt Tom to do anything but rest. After all, a weekend without Tom is a holiday for Jerry.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerrys Uncle Harry is coming for a visit. Tuffys excited to meet the great uncle he has heard so much about. Harry craves a respite from his life as a nomad on the party cruise ship circuit, but it doesnt take him long to realise that life on the high seas has its advantages (specifically, not being holed-up with Tom)!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippys cousin Gem wants time apart from her twin brother I.Lo but he doesnt want to hear it. When no one wants to investigate the super puff planet they discovered, Gem races off on her own, despite the high temperatures and strong winds.

programme.desc: Tilly is dressed as her alter-ego, SuperTilly - the greatest superhero in the universe! When her dad asks her if she can send him his toolbox, its SuperTilly to the rescue!

Ella realizes that sometimes when something sad happens, you need to think about it to understand it and feel sad for a while. The best thing a friend can do is be understanding and supportive.

programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a dance contest where the first prize is a jar of chocolate spread. Grizzy is hungry and decides to participate. He partners up with a talented dancing parrot and wins. Incapable of sharing, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the prize. The parrot brings the jar to a temple devoted to the glory of dancing parrots. To get it back, Grizzy and the Lemmings must perform a choreography. They decide to rehearse together.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange creature fossilized in amber resin that resembles him. A natural science encyclopedia confirms that its his ancestor. Grizzy wants to take the block of amber, but the Lemmings fight him for it because the blue animal with big teeth is their ancestor too. The block cracks during their fight and frees the ancestor who turns out to be a rather unmanageable burden.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a strange card game representing the elements along with instructions. The idea is to pretend that the ground is on fire or of ice, like in the game "Floor is Lava." They transform the cabin into a giant adventure trail. Depending on the card drawn, they must avoid zones on the floor with flames or wax. Grizzy unceremoniously gets rids of the setup to regain control of the cabin. One of the cards lands on a stone slab that transforms into lava. The Lemmings are delighted: they will be able to play "for real"!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a very particular cocoa tree with chocolate-spread sap! Reduced to eating canned Brussels sprouts, the only remaining food in the cabin, Grizzy is baffled when he sees the Lemmings parading past to equip themselves with all sorts of containers: ladles, soup spoons, bowls, buckets, basins, etc. He watches them through binoculars and discovers that they have planted a faucet in a tree where chocolate spread flows. Grizzy decides to siphon off their tree.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy expels the Lemmings from the cabin where they had built a cumbersome obstacle course. Peaceful at last and feeling lazy, he is determined not to leave his couch. The Lemmings discover a magic Mayan disc that allows you to choose instantaneous mutations of other animals features: bat wings, reindeer antlers, elephant trunks, etc. The mutant Lemmings return to the cabin, determined to continue playing their game while enjoying their new accessories.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
